summary: This document outlines the Articles of Incorporation for the J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc., detailing its purpose, management structure, and initial board of trustees. The foundation is established for charitable, educational, and scientific purposes, with Jeffrey Epstein as a key figure in its management.

keyFacts: The J. Epstein Virgin Islands Foundation, Inc. is established for charitable, educational, and scientific purposes.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the member and president of the foundation.
The initial Board of Trustees includes Jeffrey E. Epstein, Paul Hoffman, and Jeffrey Schantz.
The foundation is structured to ensure that no part of its net earnings benefits any individual.
The document was acknowledged before a notary public on June 27, 2000.
